content.en: Optimizing Drug Delivery: Researchers are using algorithms to improve drug delivery by studying the flow dynamics of the micro-circulatory system. They are developing novel algorithms to simulate hybrid nanofluid flow and analyzing the features of entropy generation in blood biofluids. These algorithms are helping to optimize heat transportation and minimize entropy generation in order to enhance the effectiveness of drug delivery.
content.da: Optimering af medicinlevering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at forbedre medicinlevering ved at studere strømningsdynamikken i det mikrocirkulatoriske system. De udvikler nye algoritmer til at simulere hybrid nanovæskestrøm og analyserer egenskaberne ved entropigenerering i blodbiofluider. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at optimere varmetransporten og minimere entropigenerering for at øge effektiviteten af medicinlevering.
